subject: Changes in Bidder Eligibility Criteria of NH projects under Hybrid Annuity Mode-Reg.
text: HRay <5 rTHNf qifetarut (Teq5 9de &r RTTHf TAT4, ARG TAFT) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) T44 *4 6i-5 Qa 6, #a7-10, ERq1, 7f fcvlt 110 075 e G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, Delhi-110075 TMT /Phone 91-11-25074100 25074200 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/ Standard Documents/202z Policy Circular No. 11.36/2022 dated 27th April, 2022 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. NHAI/CMD/HAM/2020 (Computer No: 46724)} Sub:: Changes in Bidder Eligibility Criteria of NH projects under Hybrid Annuity Mode-Reg: MoRTH vide letter F. No_ NH-24028/14/2014-H (Vol. I)   (Comp no_ 134863) dated 11.04.2022 has decided to extend the amended provisions relating to 'Threshold Technical Capacity' of clause 2.2.2.2(ii) & (iii) of Standard RFP document of EPC projects to the similar works of HAM projects and has inserted clauses 2.2.2(AA) and (AAA) below clause 2.2.2(A) in Model RFP document of HAM: A copy of the MoRTH vide letter dated 11.04.2022 is attached herewith for implementation with immediate effect: 2 _ This issues with the approval of the Competent Authority. Encl.= As above 27 | (ou/2z (Sanjay Kumar Patel) To: General Manager (Coord:) All Officers of NHAI HQ/ ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices to: 1 _ Hindi Officer for translation in Hindi. 2. Library for hosting the circular on library site. 3. Web Admin for circulation. '91 7 U % NHAL New Copy
